title: International visitor spending in Paris 2010 to 2018
yAxis: International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars, about 19.5 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest International visitor spending in billion U.S. dollars, of value 12.03 was reported at Year 2016
